Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains

Contains all the standard Zeidon domains.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Domain
    Interface for all domains.
    DomainClassLoader
    Interface for loading the Domain objects.
    DomainContext  
    TableDomain
    Additional methods for Table Domains.
    TableDomainContext  
    TableEntry  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDomain
    Implements default domain processing.
    AbstractNumericDomain
    A Domain class so that all numeric domains can be grouped together.
    AbstractTableDomain
    Common domain code for static and dynamic table domains.
    Argon2PasswordDomain
    A domain for storing passwords using Argon2id password hashing function.
    Base64BlobDomain
    A version of the Blob domain that uses Base64 for getString() and setting from a string.
    BaseDomainContext  
    BigDecimalDomain  
    BlobDomain  
    BooleanDomain  
    CaseAwareStringDomain
    A subclass of StringDomain that is aware of the case-sensitive flag in the AttributeDef.
    CreatedDateTimeDomain
    A version of DateTimeDoman that will initialize an attribute to the current time.
    DateDomain  
    DateTimeDomain
    This domain handles any differences needed to deal with dates+time.
    DomainDateTimeFormatter
    A DateTime class for parsing strings into ZonedDateTime and formatting ZonedDateTime back into strings.
    DoubleDomain
    Decimal domain, which stores values as Double.
    DynamicTableDomain
    Implementation of standard dynamic table domains.
    EmailAddressDomain  
    GeneratedKeyDomain
    This is a domain for storing keys generated by the DB.
    IntegerDomain
    Domain for storing Integers.
    LongDomain  
    PasswordDomain
    A domain for storing passwords using strong encryption.
    PhoneDomain  
    RegularExpressionDomain  
    SSNDomain  
    StaticTableDomain  
    StringDomain  
    TableDomain.ImmutableTableEntry  
    TableListContext
    Implementation of TableDomainContext that keeps the list of table entries in an internal list.
    TimeDomain
    This domain handles any differences needed to deal with time.
    UuidDomain
    UUID.

Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains Description

Contains all the standard Zeidon domains.
